NPC ID3247

Wizard Akutha runs the Rune Store in the Wizards' Guild. The quest, The Hand in the Sand, must be completed to access his store.

Due to the high price of his runes, it is not often worthwhile to buy from him. However, his shop does stock blood runes at the lowest price.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
28 June 2018
(update)

The NPC's name was changed from "Magic Store owner" to "Wizard Akutha".

17 August 2017
(update)

The Magic Store owner now wields a staff to make him easier to identify.
